last_episode_to_air.name: Coach Cleen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Artists Ashley Velazquez and Tim Lees return for their shots at redemption with help from fan favorite Cleen Rock One.

name: Ink Master: Redemption
overview: In "Ink Master: Redemption," human canvases from previous "Ink Master" seasons, who left unhappy with their tattoos, return to the shop for a chance at new ink. Each episode will feature a different twist, including the risk that your tattoo artist is the same one who gave you the original tattoo.

episodes.name: Hula Girls & Garter Belts
episodes.overview: Canvases who are unhappy return for a chance at a new tattoo. Tim Lees & ES face hostile canvases.

episodes.name: Mystical Mistakes
episodes.overview: Mystical Mike and Don are back for redemption, but egos collide when they must tag team with a fan favorite.

episodes.name: Walk-Outs
episodes.overview: Tatu Baby, Jason Clay Dunn, and Julia face Human Canvases that walked out on them during the competition. This time around, can the Artists and Canvases see eye-to-eye to get redemption?

episodes.name: Fool Me Twice
episodes.overview: Canvases who have been tattooed in the competition twice return and face their original artists, who are back to battle it out for redemption. Emily Elegado, Angel, Bubba, and Jim return.

episodes.name: Settling The Score
episodes.overview: Rival Artists design head-to-head to please unhappy Canvases, but only one will receive a shot at redemption. Josh Hibbard and Kyle Dunbar, and brothers Robbie and Jayvo return.

episodes.name: Mind Over Master
episodes.overview: Artists must out design Ink Masters to impress their canvases for a shot at redemption. Nick D'Angelo, Ryan Eternal, Jason Clay Dunn, and Steve Tefft return.

episodes.name: Triple Threat
episodes.overview: Kito is faced with not 1 but 3 unhappy canvases, including one the most infamous canvases of all time.

episodes.name: Two Right Feet
episodes.overview: James Vaughn returns to redeem one of the most infamous pin up mistakes in Ink Master history.

episodes.name: Behind Every Inked Man...
episodes.overview: Unhappy canvases bring back-up to face their artists Ashley B. and Ally Lee in the Ink Master shop.

episodes.name: Cheetah Print Pain
episodes.overview: After a canvas tapped out, Big Ceeze, Chris Blinston, Dave Clark and Katie McGowan seek a second chance.

episodes.name: Stained Glass From The Past
episodes.overview: Sarah Miller returns to call out Steve Tefft while Miami Burgess returns to call out Big Ceeze.

episodes.name: The Witch Is Back
episodes.overview: The self-proclaimed wicked witch of Ink Master Emily Elegado returns to redeem three unhappy canvases.

episodes.name: Two Heads Are Better
episodes.overview: Duffy Fortner is back for Redemption with help from Kruseman while rivals Cris Element and Angel return.

episodes.name: Reinking History
episodes.overview: St. Marq and Ty'Esha Reels return to the Ink Master shop to fix their unhappy canvasesâ€™ tattoos.

episodes.name: You Get What You Pay For
episodes.overview: Things get rough when Gentle Jay returns to the shop to face not one but three unhappy canvases.

episodes.name: Inked in Honor
episodes.overview: Honor is on the line as Lydia Bruno and Lalo return to redeem their mistakes on unhappy veteran canvases.

episodes.name: Spousal Support
episodes.overview: Jesse Smith and Clint Cummings return to face unhappy canvases and their bitter better-halves.

episodes.name: Nice Guys Finish Last?
episodes.overview: Customer service is tested when Randy Vollink & Mark Longenecker are confronted by their unhappy canvases.

episodes.name: Master Canvas Call Out
episodes.overview: Runner-up master canvases are back to argue and advocate on behalf of the artists who tattooed them.

episodes.name: Finish What You Started
episodes.overview: Tatu Baby and King Ruck return to the shop to complete the work they started on their unhappy canvases.

episodes.name: One Tatt Wonders
episodes.overview: Artists get help from Tommy Montoya to ensure they donâ€™t make the same mistakes twice on their canvases.

episodes.name: Peace Out, Cub Scout
episodes.overview: Season 5 artist Julia Carlson is back for a shot at redemption with not 1, not 2, but 3 unhappy canvases.

episodes.name: X-Rated Blunders
episodes.overview: Scarred with tattoos that look like private parts, two canvases are ready to confront their canvases.

episodes.name: Coming in Hot
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when pissed off canvases return with their overprotective loved ones.

episodes.name: Road Show
episodes.overview: Tatu Baby flips the redemption tables seeking out her unhappy canvases by going to their home towns.

episodes.name: Master of Horror
episodes.overview: Artists Don Peddicord and Sebastian Murphy return for shots at Redemption on horror tattoos.

episodes.name: Don't Butcher My Baby
episodes.overview: Keith Diffenderfer and Aaron Is return to canvases with overprotective parents.

episodes.name: Massacred Memorials
episodes.overview: Canvases with memorial tattoos theyâ€™d rather forget return to confront the artist who wronged them.

episodes.name: High Anxiety
episodes.overview: Alex Rockoff returns to the Ink Master shop with not one nor two but three unhappy Canvases.

episodes.name: Birds of Prey
episodes.overview: Two pissed off canvases with bird blunder tattoos return to the Ink Master shop with their spouses.

episodes.name: Coach Cleen
episodes.overview: Artists Ashley Velazquez and Tim Lees return for their shots at redemption with help from fan favorite Cleen Rock One.
